Package net.sf.freecol.client.gui.option

Interface OptionUpdater

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUnitOptionUI, AudioMixerOptionUI, BooleanOptionUI, FileOptionUI, FreeColActionUI, IntegerOptionUI, LanguageOptionUI, ListOptionUI, ModOptionUI, OptionGroupUI, OptionUI, PercentageOptionUI, RangeOptionUI, SelectOptionUI, SliderOptionUI, StringOptionUI, TextOptionUI, UnitTypeOptionUI

    public interface OptionUpdater
    Interface for classes which temporarily stores changes for an Option. Calling updateOption() should update the Option with that new information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void reset​()
      Reset with the value from the option.
      void updateOption​()
      Updates the value of the Option this object keeps.

    • Method Detail

      • updateOption

        void updateOption​()
        Updates the value of the Option this object keeps.

      • reset

        void reset​()
        Reset with the value from the option.
